title: Recreating Eden
description: Dendra loves her life as the Botanist on planet Gliese 581-f. Sheâ€™s transformed the once barren planet into another Eden. When she discovers the body of her dead lover, she realizes things have gone very wrong.Dendra must face the past she has forgotten, the lover she has lost, and come to the realization that she has known the killer's identity all along.
author: M.A. Drake
